'''YouTube Creators Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Mcnet|let-new-years-celebration-begin|Let the New Year’s Celebration Begin|December 15, 2021|Sofia Dankis}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] devoted to several content creators for the game. The pack was made as a tie-in to [[One Trillion Minecraft Views on YouTube and Counting]], and released as part of the 2021 [[New Year's Celebration]].
